description:
Attorneys Jeff Foreman and Jim Watson founded Foreman Watson, LLP, now known as Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, in 1994 with the goal of providing high-quality real estate legal services to the residents of northwestern Kentucky and southern Indiana. In the years since our firm's founding, our firm's growth has been continuous. In 2008 the partners made the business decision to branch out in the fields of law, hiring four attorneys and opening a satellite office located in Hartford, Kentucky. Travis L. Holtrey was welcomed as managing partner in January, 2012, opened a second satellite office in Elizabethtown, Kentucky and expanded our firm's practice areas to now cover:


• Personal injury law
• Workers’ Compensation Law
• Divorce and family law
• Estate planning and probate
• Real estate law
• Immigration law
• Employment law
• Corporate law


Presently, our law firm is home to nine attorneys, who have more than 100 years of combined experience, and a full staff, including two office managers and five litigation assistants who work as a team to ensure that our clients receive legal representation of the highest quality. In addition to our firm's lawyers and staff, Foreman Watson Holtrey also maintains a strong network of other professionals, including of counsel attorneys, medical experts, accident reconstructionist, engineers and accountants.

If you have a legal need and you live in Owensboro, Hartford, Elizabethtown or the surrounding Kentucky communities, you can turn to the law firm of Foreman Watson Holtrey, LLP, for help. Our attorneys will work hard in an effort to help you reach your goals and overcome the legal challenges before you. Learn more about how we can help you by taking advantage of our free initial consultation or by visiting our website at www.fwhlegal.com.
